title: Oh no my content has been removed
body:
_League of Legends is an international game enjoyed by many nations and people, so we encourage everyone to show mutual respect. You should refrain from posting ignorant stereotypes if you want to remain here in the future._

So what you're saying is every time Colonel J says the world liberal I can report his post and expect it to be removed, and him banned for it some point soon?

Thanks mod. I'm not sure what I posted that was removed but sure you've given me a great idea.
